about_the_game:
At least 7 Months in the making, the elusive PHIJKCHU Quest is here to change everything.
Finally an RPG where you can make the choices that matter in ways that matter.
Finally an RPG with multiple Funny's.
Finally a Quest... of PHIJKCHU.


^ picture of Rusp and his friends! (some of them are not really friends but for the sake of clarity they can basically be considered friends (within reason))


Join the questionably heroic protagonist Rusp and his gang on the quest to go on a quest.
Meet many exciting and normal foes & friends as you explore gamemode after gamemode, map after map, song after song, all unified by a genre hallmark RPG engine handbaked by our skilled programmer.

Defining Features!!
> Over 2 hours of gameplay
> Walking engine
> RPG Engine
> Music
> Sound effects
> Graphics
> Animated sprites
> Skill system (vaguely)!
> Naval Combat
> Various Minigames!!
> and...
> more...

content_descriptors.notes: Ample crude language and jokes. Some death (more of a punchline than anything else and cartoonish in nature)

Finally an RPG where you can make the choices that matter in ways that matter.
Finally an RPG with multiple Funny's.

^ picture of Rusp and his friends! (some of them are not really friends but for the sake of clarity they can basically be considered friends (within reason))


Join the questionably heroic protagonist Rusp and his gang on the quest to go on a quest.
Meet many exciting and normal foes & friends as you explore gamemode after gamemode, map after map, song after song, all unified by a genre hallmark RPG engine handbaked by our skilled programmer.

name: Phijkchu Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32 Bit) or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Phijkchu Quest is an experience in which you will discover truly what it means to be on a Phijkchu Quest.
